reviewText: This DVD is not suitable for use in Canada very disappointed. I had to view it on my laptop.
This DVD is not suitable for use in Ireland very disappointed.

I bought this video as a Christmas gift for my son who is goalie for his high school and club teams. It is a fun video to watch.  I took 4 soccer boys to State Games 4 hours from home and this video entertained them.  It was fun listening to their comments.
This is excellent dvd of some of the greatest goalscorers Liverpool Football Club ever had well worth the money and collectors item for any expat Scouser and ex Koppite.

Brilliant DVD that counts down the top 50 goalscorers for Liverpool.  Hosted by one of them, John Aldridge, the goalscorers range from psycho Ian St. John, to Jimmy Case, Steve Highway, Peter Beardsley, to the obvious trio of Keegan, Dalglish, and Rush.  Get it...you won't be disappointed.
